AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Hayase Yuuka
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Enrolled in the Millennium Science School, Yuuka is the treasurer of the student council known as "Seminar".

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Ushio Noa
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Member of the Millennium Science School, secretary of the "Seminar" student council.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Rio
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Student President of the Millennium Science School and the Chairwoman of "Seminar".
